titleStmt.title: A good day vvell improved, or Five sermons upon Acts 9. 31 Two of which were preached at Pauls, and ordered to be printed. To which is annexed a sermon on 2 Tim. 1. 13. Preached at St. Maries in Cambridge, on the Commencement Sabbath, June 30. 1650. By Anthony Tuckney D.D. and Master of St Johns College in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Tuckney, Anthony, 1599-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.F. for I. Rothwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
